overview: The 20th anniversary of “WWE Tribute To The Troops” was pre-recorded at Gainbridge Fieldhouse in Indianapolis, Indiana on November 11, 2022, but wasn't publicly broadcast until Saturday, Dec. 17, 2022 on Fox.  “Tribute To The Troops” is an annual show that honors servicemen and women and their families and thanks them for their continued sacrifice to our country.
title: WWE Tribute to the Troops 2022
